entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
